review:
*** ** *** **** ****** *** I will be a repeat to her

i had a worse experience owing to Practo though. ASter doesnt honour practo book and ASter management in terms of parking support or customer care lady on the board line are very unprofessional etc.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Suchismita treated my 81-yr old mom in a very critical state, just out of the ICU and in ward, with a multitude of complex problems including heart, lung infection, kidney malfunctions and so on. She takes a holistic and symptomatic approach and is very positive and reassuring rather than giving up on my mom at all, because of her age and multiple complications. She has great intuitions that come from experience, and a great attitude that comes from a unique combination of confidence and humility. I will go to her for any general medicine issues for my entire family and would recommend her to all my friends too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** ******** *** *** **** ***********.she has treated my entire family and all are different age groups right from 96 years to 24 years.her investigation style is awesome and easily identify the issues and gives best easy possible solutions.she allows patient to talk and listen everything with calm.she don't ask many tests and reports ,if require only she will suggest.patient will be very confident after having consultation  with doctor.Thank you Doctor for all the support and you are a wonderful doctor.I strongly recommend her for all sort of issues.Thank you,Gowtam samrat.
